Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides a legacy credit to the children and siblings of veterans who were killed in the line of duty
Summary: Provides a legacy credit to the children and siblings of veterans who were killed in the line of duty including veterans who were disabled as a result of their service, exposed to toxic substances, or presumptive conditions determined by the department of veterans affairs.
LawCode: Add ยง85-d, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to providing a legacy credit to the children and siblings of persons who served in the military and were killed in the line of duty
